Forms Contact Us Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Financial Aid>Financial Aid Basics>Important Dates Important Dates Many financial aid programs are awarded on a first-come, first-served basis until funds are exhausted. You can maximize your opportunity to be considered for funds by paying close attention to important financial aid dates and theAcademic Calendar. Key Dates for the 2024-2025 and 2025-2026 Academic Year Financial Aid Disbursement Dates Funds will be disbursed to your student account after the close of business on these dates. You will see the credit(s) reflected on your account the next business day. Undergraduate and Graduate Students Law Students Class Start and Registration Dates Please visit theUniversity Registrar websiteto view registration dates. Tuition and Payment Plan Dates Please visit theStudent Accounts websiteto view important dates and deadlines for tuition and payment plans.
